title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 455.4 - Maximum length of stay
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 455.4 - Maximum length of stay

State Regulations

The provisions of sections
452.9
(c) and
408.6
of this Title apply to the
maximum length of stay of residents in domestic violence safe dwellings; provided, however, that domestic violence sponsoring agencies may impose a
length of stay which is less than the maximum set forth in such
section. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
455.4

Adopted

New

York State Register April 1, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 13, eff. 4/1/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
